[ FAQ ]
Frequently Asked Questions

Your question not answered here?

Contact Us
How does pricing work for the code review bot?

Code reviews are priced at a flat rate of $30 per developer per month, with unlimited code reviews included.

Can I prepay for a discount?

Yes, we offer up to 20% off for 1+year contracts!

How does the chat pricing work?

Our chat pricing is based on a fixed monthly subscription. You can use the chat service as much as you need, and we don't limit the number of requests.

What is the difference between the Standard API and the Genius API?

The Genius API offers a more advanced model for complex tasks, making it ideal for code review and debugging.

How do I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. If you have any questions, please contact us.

Can I set an API usage limit?

Yes, you can set an API usage limit and a warning threshold. You can do this through your account settings.
